messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] constant high-pitched screams
messages.msgSnippet: LOL!! I m blessed with both the growly 7 year old and the squealing/screeching train whistle 3 year old. AAAHH!! Those nice little take home baby packages are
messages.messageBody:
LOL!! I'm blessed with both the growly 7 year old and the
squealing/screeching train whistle 3 year old. AAAHH!! Those nice little
take home baby packages are ill-equiped. I'd take a pair of ear plugs over
baby booties any day! ;-)

Lee

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] constant high-pitched screams
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 08/09/2000 11:45:59 PM !!!First Boot!!!, naake1999@hotmail.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 08/09/2000 11:45:59 PM !!!First Boot!!!,
naake1999@... writes:

<< aming 3-year-old. I would not have believed
without hearing the squeals, shrieks and glass-shattering screeches that
emanate from my little blond angel. It does, to say >>


Then, if it makes you feel any better :), there is my 7 yo son. Who has
discovered how to lower his voice and sound really, really LOUD! I think he
startled himself the first time he realized how growly he can sound but now
pulls out his "scary monster" voice when the world is not going his way!

Are we having fun yet?? :)

Nance
